full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SER BYES GRVA TSANG GI PHAR PHYIN SKABS DANG PO'I SPYI MTHA' GNYIS KYI YIG SKYON BSAL BA'I THO DOGS GCOD DANG 'BREL BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @124B ZHES PA 'DI NI ^SER STONG MKHAN ZUR BLO BZANG DGE 'DUN DPAL BZANG POS MDZAD PA'O, ,LEGS BSHAD RIN CHEN DOGS GCOD 'DI'I SPAR, BLO GSAL RNAMS KYI 'CHAD NYAN 'PHEL PHYIR DU, DAR PA PAndI TA YI SKYE MING PAS, BKRA SHIS DAR RGYAS GLING GI CHOS GRVAR BSGRUB, ,'DIS MTSON RNAM DKAR DGE BA'I PHUN PO 'DI, ,'JAM MGON BLA MA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE, ,PHYOGS DUS GNAS SKABS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS ZHING, , BSTAN 'DZIN RNAMS KYI ZHABS PAD BRTAN PA DANG, ,RGYAL KHAMS SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR YUL PHYOGS 'DIR, ,DGE BA BCU YIS LUGS SROL 'PHEL BA DANG, MA NOR LAM BZANG @125A *, ,STON PA'I BSHES GNYEN GYIS, ,DGYES BZHIN RJES SU 'DZIN PA'I RGYU RU BSNGO, ,BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR DZAM GLING RGYAN DU ,DGE'O, ,
author_simple: BLO BZANG DGE 'DUN DPAL BZANG PO,
